item.title: DISH
item.description: score:92 Chances: Merging with EchoStar creates a new kind of satellite and wireless data services company. Merger aims to give financial flexibility to build a nationwide wireless network. Share price saw a 10% increase after the merger announcement. Creation of a larger wireless network to compete with AT&T and Verizon.
